data.caption: Rumour verification - Regulation 30(11)
data.news_body: Reply to the Clarification sought.

data.caption: Clarification sought from JK Lakshmi Cement Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from JK Lakshmi Cement Ltd on July 25 2025 with reference to news appeared in https://www.moneycontrol.com/ dated July 25 2025 quoting "JK Lakshmi Chettinad in race to acquire Deccan Cements amid Andhra infrastructure push: Report"

The reply is awaited.
